Personaldata employee module
============================

Basic address + other personal data module.

Registering
-----------

We'll add a personaldata object:

    >>> self.setRoles(['Manager'])
    >>> from Products.CMFPlone.utils import _createObjectByType
    >>> _createObjectByType('PersonalData', portal, 'personal')
    <PersonalData at /plone/personal>

Call the view:

    >>> view = portal.restrictedTraverse('personal/@@personaldataview')
    >>> view
    <Products.Five.metaclass.PersonalDataView object at ...>
